Package socialmedia

Class Account

java.lang.Object
socialmedia.Account
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Account extends Object implements Serializable
The class that contains all of the user account objects. These consist of a unique ID, a handle, a description and an ArrayList of posts made by this account. The class has the attribute NO_OF_ACCOUNTS, which is used to create IDs
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    Constructors

    Description
    Account(String handle)
    The first constructor for the account does not set a description and instead intitalises it to an empty string
    Account(String handle, String description)
    The second constructor for the account takes the description as a parameter as well as the handle

  • Constructor Details

    • Account

      public Account(String handle)
      The first constructor for the account does not set a description and instead intitalises it to an empty string
      Parameters:
      handle - - String: the handle of the account that the user wishes to create

    • Account

      public Account(String handle, String description)
      The second constructor for the account takes the description as a parameter as well as the handle
      Parameters:
      handle - - String: the handle of the account that the user wishes to create
      description - - String: the description for the account

  • Method Details

    • makePost

      public int makePost(String message)
      Create a Post object associated with this account, adding it to the list of posts
      Parameters:
      message - - String: the message that the post should contain
      Returns:
      id - int: the ID generated by NO_OF_POSTS which is automatically assigned and incremented

    • makeComment

      public int makeComment(int originalId, String message)
      Create a comment object, given the ID of the original post and a message
      Parameters:
      originalId - - int: The ID of the original post this comment references
      message - - String: The message that the comment will have
      Returns:
      id - The ID of this comment, generated by NO_OF_POSTS which is automatically assigned and incremented

    • makeEndorsement

      public int makeEndorsement(int originalId, String originalHandle, String orignalMessage)
      Create an endorsement, given the ID of the original post, the handle of the original poster, and the original post's message. The message is formatted to show that it is an endorsement
      Parameters:
      originalId - - int : The ID of the original post
      originalHandle - - String: The handle of the original poster
      orignalMessage - - String: The message of the original post
      Returns:
      id - int: the ID of this endorsement, generated by NO_OF_POSTS which is automatically assigned and incremented

    • endorsed

      public void endorsed()
      void method, used whenever an endorsement post referring to a post on this account is created. increments the noOfEndorsements attribute of the account object

    • unendorsed

      public void unendorsed()
      void method, used whenever an endorsement post referring to a post on this account is deleted decrements the noOfEndorsements attribute of the account object

    • hasPost

      public boolean hasPost(int id)
      check if an account has a specific post before getting it. This avoids exceptions raised trying to access a post that doesn't exist
      Parameters:
      id - - int: the ID of the post that is being looked for
      Returns:
      boolean: whether or not this ID is linked to a post in the posts ArrayList

    • getPost

      public Post getPost(int id) throws PostIDNotRecognisedException
      Retrieve a requested post based on its ID, usually called after hasPost()
      Parameters:
      id - - int: the ID of the post that is being grabbed
      Returns:
      p - Post: the post that is linked to that ID
      Throws:
      PostIDNotRecognisedException - - thrown if the ID does not match a post from this account

    • deletePost

      public void deletePost(int id) throws PostIDNotRecognisedException
      This method deletes a post from the posts ArrayList, removing its link to the account that created it
      Parameters:
      id - - The ID of the post that is being deleted from this account
      Throws:
      PostIDNotRecognisedException - - thrown if the ID is not linked to a post from this account

    • deleteAllPosts

      public void deleteAllPosts()
      This method removes every post in the posts ArrayList. This is called before an account is deleted, to remove all of its associated posts

    • reset

      public static void reset()
      void method, used when the platform is reset. Sets the counter for NO_OF_ACCOUNTS to zero, so the IDs start incrementing from 1 again

    • getNO_OF_ACCOUNTS

      public static int getNO_OF_ACCOUNTS()
      getter, returnes the private static attribute NO_OF_ACCOUTNS
      Returns:
      NO_OF_ACCOUNTS - int: the number of accounts ever created, used to increment the ID of new accounts

    • getHandle

      public String getHandle()
      getter, returns the handle
      Returns:
      handle - String: the handle of the account

    • getId

      public int getId()
      getter, returns the ID
      Returns:
      id - int: the ID of the account

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      getter, returns the description of the account
      Returns:
      description - String: the description of the account created

    • setHandle

      public void setHandle(String handle)
      setter, updates the handle of the account object
      Parameters:
      handle - - String: the new handle that will be assigned to the account

    • setDescription

      public void setDescription(String description)
      setter, updates the description of the account object
      Parameters:
      description - - String: the new description that will be assigned to the account

    • getNoOfPosts

      public int getNoOfPosts()
      getter - gets the size of the posts ArrayList, the number of not deleted posts created by this account
      Returns:
      posts.size - int: the size of the posts ArrayList

    • getNoOfEndorsements

      public int getNoOfEndorsements()
      getter - returns the attribute numberOfEndorsements
      Returns:
      noOfEndorsements - int: The number of Endorsements linked to this account

    • getComments

      public ArrayList<Comment> getComments()
      getter - loops through the posts ArrayList, to retrieve any Comment objects and add them to a new ArrayList, which is used in showPostChildrenDetails()
      Returns:
      comments - ArrayList : a list of comments created by this account

    • getPosts

      public ArrayList<Post> getPosts()
      getter, returns the ArrayList containing this account's posts
      Returns:
      posts - ArrayList : an ArrayList of all of the account's posts

    • setNO_OF_ACOUNTS

      public static void setNO_OF_ACOUNTS(Integer no)
      void method, used to set the number of accounts when loading the platform from a file. This ensures the IDs of newly created accounts are correct
      Parameters:
      no - - int: the value of NO_OF_ACCOUNTS that was saved when savePlatform() was invoked
